attributes.action: Put the clocks forward at the end of February, so that "Winter" covers a similar period either side of the shortest day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Objective: Boost morale & save energy.
As things stand clocks are put back one hour at end of October, ie some 8 weeks before Winter solstace; they aren't put forward again until some 14 weeks after solstace.  There is enough daylight to do this at end of February.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/clocks-change/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
